programme.desc: Brooke tells Thorne about the police's insensitive treatment of Caroline and Thorne is livid.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful

programme.desc: Beth tells Eric it's impossible for them to pick up where they left off. Bill hires a P.I. to find the rapist.

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 111
programme.desc: Dave reassures Caroline that the entire police force is behind the investigation. Donna misses Rocco.

programme.desc: Ridge cautions his mother about jumping to conclusions. Donna and Mark assess their bleak financial situation.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful

programme.desc: Ridge promises to check out the house that Eric visited. The police have narrowed their suspects down.

programme.desc: Stephanie thinks that Eric is having an affair with Brooke. Throne confesses his love for Caroline to Eric.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful

programme.desc: Rocco considers his future and Donna reminds him about Ridge's offer. Storm offers Mark some financial help.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 118

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 119
programme.desc: Stephanie is dismayed over Thorne's silence regarding Caroline's rape and why Ridge has not been informed.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful

programme.desc: Storm is impressed that Caroline wants the rapist to be prosecuted. Kristen is dubious of Ridge's ambivalence.

programme.desc: Eric is stunned that Stephanie visited the Logan house but is relieved that she only went to visit Caroline.

programme.desc: Ridge now realizes the reason for Caroline's strange disappearance. Stephanie receives a mysterious call.

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 124

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 125
programme.desc: Mark is jealous of Rocco. He and Katie have qualms about Rocco and Donna. Thorne asks Ridge about his wound.

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 126
programme.desc: Caroline and Storm come home from a movie. Rocco still wants Donna. Mark tells Donna not to see him anymore.

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 127
programme.desc: Margo is sympathetic about Caroline's plight. Brooke, Katie and Caroline agree that the coverage is important.

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 128
programme.desc: Thorne and Stephanie discuss Ridge's reaction. Rocco prepares for his meeting with Ridge and kisses Donna.

programme.desc: Rocco and Donna rejoice over his successful interview. Caroline urges Throne not to accept Bill's offer.

programme.desc: Eric discusses Bill's manipulative ways with Margo who pleads innocence. Ridge thinks about Caroline.

programme.desc: Brooke reveals that Ridge has made advances towards her. Donna tells Mark about Rocco's interview.

programme.desc: Donna sees a doctor about her suspicions. Eric visits Bill and warns him to stop meddling in his family.
